game.title: The Missing Prince
game.objective: Find the missing prince who vanished from his castle.
game.description: Prince Edric of Highgarden vanished without a trace from his castle overnight. His family is distraught and rumors swirl of a traitor's plot or a malevolent curse. Unravel the mystery and bring the prince back to safety.
game.reward: A rare relic of the ancient kingdom, a token of the royal family's gratitude, and 1000 gold
game.quest-giver: Lord Edgar Harroway, Castellan of Highgarden

task.objective: Gather testimonies from the castle servants and guards.
task.description: Interview the castle's staff and security personnel to uncover any unusual events or suspicious behavior leading up to the prince's disappearance. Examine the prince's chambers for clues.

task.objective: Seek information in the nearby town.
task.description: Visit the local taverns and markets to listen for rumors or sightings that might lead to the missing prince. Inquire with travelers and merchants who frequent the castle.
task.location: Oakbridge Town, The Rusty Tankard Inn

task.objective: Investigate the old abandoned mine outside the castle grounds.
task.description: Legends speak of a secret passage leading from the castle to an ancient mine. Explore the mine for clues or signs of the prince's whereabouts. Beware of dangers that lurk within.

task.objective: Confront the suspected traitor or rescue the prince if captured.
task.description: Based on gathered information, confront the traitor who may be responsible for the prince's disappearance. Engage in diplomatic negotiation or prepare for a showdown. If the prince is being held captive, mount a rescue operation.
